content: भयानक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बिभेत्यस्मात्, --भी-आनक्; <ls>Uṇ. 3. 82</ls>] Fearful, horrible, terrible, frightful; किमतः परं भयानकं स्यात् <ls>U. 2</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 20</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 27.</ls> --कः {@--1@} A tiger. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Rāhu. {@--3@} The sentiment of terror, one of the eight or nine sentiments in poetry; see under रस. --कं Terror, fear.
